thread.title: Super Bowl 2017: 10 crazy ways Atlantans are showing Falcons spirit
thread.title_full: Super Bowl 2017: 10 crazy ways Atlantans are showing Falcons spirit

author: Najja Parker
title: Super Bowl 2017: 10 crazy ways Atlantans are showing Falcons spirit
text:
Sure, T-shirts and jerseys are great ways to support the Falcons as they prepare for the Super Bowl . But don’t just wear your pride on your sleeves. Take notes from a few Atlantans who creatively turned their fan love up a notch with these out-of-the-box ideas.
»RELATED: Rise up and do the ‘Dirty Bird’ with these Falcons-inspired songs, dances and remixes
Cakes
Happy Saturday!! RISE UP ATL!! #riseup #falcons #gofalcons #cakes #cake #bakery #madefromacratch #atl #atlanta #atlantafalcons #superbowl #dirtybirds #weloveatl
